pre.description: Input collection must not be null

guard.description: The input collection must not be null.

pre.description: Input collection size must not exceed 10 to prevent excessive computation time

guard.description: The input collection size must be 10 or fewer elements to avoid long processing times.

throws.description: Thrown if the input collection is null.
Thrown if the input collection size exceeds 10, advising the use of PermutationIterator for larger collections.
